property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Angel of Serenity enters the battlefield, you may exile up to three other target creatures from the battlefield and/or creature cards from graveyards. When Angel of Serenity leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owners' hands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Armory Guard has vigilance as long as you control a Gate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Dimir agents watched from the shadows. "Eight hours, and I've yet to see him blink," Nefara hissed. "I suggest we find another way in."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We will prove your guilt. We don't arrest the innocent, you know." - Arrester Lavinia, Tenth Precinct

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature that dealt damage this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Forgive the theft. Punish the deception." - Alcarus, Selesnya archer

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Azorius Arrester enters the battlefield, detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You have the right to remain silent. Mostly because I tire of your excuses."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Azorius Justiciar enters the battlefield, detain up to two target creatures your opponents control. (Until your next turn, those creatures can't attack or block and their activated abilities can't be activated.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your potential to commit a crime warrants further investigation."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Bazaar Krovod attacks, another target attacking creature gets +0/+2 until end of turn. Untap that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Hauler's Collective wields great influence over the Ravnican merchant class. Without it, little moves in the city.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A kick from its hooves is like a bolt of lightning. I'd know. I've been hit by both." - Rencz, Izzet chemister's aide

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each enchantment you control and has first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Metal is scarce, smiths are pricey, and plate mail is heavy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What root and branch cannot reach, our winged friends will attend to." - Zunak, Selesnya strategist

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His prowess gives the guildless hope that they can hold out against tyranny.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Keening Apparition: Destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some souls are too damaged to be of use to the Orzhov.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Knightly Valor enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.) Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The good of society matters much more than the inconvenience of a few." - Agmand Sarv, Azorius hussar

property.name: Rules
property.value: All damage that would be dealt to you and other permanents you control is dealt to Palisade Giant instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Refusing guild allegiances, she fights for those who can't protect themselves.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After his death, the general was reunited with fallen soldiers from over thirty of his campaigns.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Whenever Precinct Captain deals combat damage to a player, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In troubled times, we all need someone to watch our back."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Rest in Peace enters the battlefield, exile all graveyards. If a card or token would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some corpses the Golgari cannot claim. Some souls the Orzhov cannot shackle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Populate. Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. (To populate, create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land When Security Blockade enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance. Enchanted land has "{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to you this turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ravnicans still tell tales about the Battle of Sumala where four Selesnya sentries held off an entire clan of Gruul warriors.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Seller of Songbirds enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Lady Wren is the one merchant in Keyhole Downs who isn't running a scam." - Mirela, Azorius hussar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant nonland permanent At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted permanent's controller, that player sacrifices it unless they pay {X}, where X is its mana value.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures can't attack you or planeswalkers you control unless their controller pays {X} for each of those creatures, where X is the number of enchantments you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Rakdos believe that all are eager to join their revels, even when told otherwise.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For each griffin wounded by an arrow, there's a corpse with a bow nearby." - Pel Javya, Wojek investigator

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike and lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Having conviction is more important than being righteous." - Aurelia

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some Ravnicans consider carrying a sword to be beneath them, preferring instead a tooth-and-claw escort.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some cannot be saved as they are, but all can serve the Worldsoul." - Trostani

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{U}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In water, it's as graceful as a dolphin. On land, it darts and jerks so unpredictably that few can ride it for long.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap target creature you don't control. Overload {3}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Weather is more predictable than the Izzet.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is forbidden. Asking why is irrelevant." - Sergiu, Opal Lake magistrate

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller mills three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With the Izzet occupied elsewhere, many of their public works fell into disrepair.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exchange control of Conjured Currency and target permanent you neither own nor control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A bargain in Keyhole Downs is always too good to be true.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Crosstown Courier deals combat damage to a player, that player mills that many cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Information travels quickly through Ravnica's network of messengers and thought agents.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand. Overload {6}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Izzet specialize in unnatural disaster.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Civilization will subsume us unless we overwhelm it instead." - Speaker Zegana

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender {2}{U}, {T}: Target player mills X cards, where X is the number of creatures you control with defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One piercing stare usually convinces thieves to go elsewhere.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you don't control gets -4/-0 until end of turn. Overload {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Faerie Impostor enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return another creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many Tin Street shops display a sign on the door: "No cloaks allowed."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As whispers and rumors increased, so did the demand for fail-safe barriers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To prevent action is to prevent transgression." - Azorius Arrester motto

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Day 31: I finally succeeded in my time reversal experiment! "Day 30: I might have a problem here." - Journal of the Prime Izmagnus

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Isperia's Skywatch enters the battlefield, detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Until your next turn, whenever a creature an opponent controls attacks, it gets -1/-0 until end of turn. −2: Reveal the top three cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library in any order. −8: For each player, search that player's library for a nonland card and exile it, then that player shuffles. You may cast those cards without paying their mana costs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gets +0/+1 and gains hexproof until end of turn. Overload {1}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Obviously, the Firemind's mission is worth more than a few goblins." - Pelener, chamberlain of Niv-Mizzet

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shuffle all cards from your graveyard into your library. Target player mills that many cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An elocutor forces criminals to confess to the laws they merely intended to break.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Runewing dies, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the hands of the open-minded, a runewing quill writes wisdom of its own.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Search the City enters the battlefield, exile the top five cards of your library. Whenever you play a card with the same name as one of the exiled cards, you may put one of those cards with that name into its owner's hand. Then if there are no cards exiled with Search the City, sacrifice it. If you do, take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It will dodge your first arrow and flatten you before there's a second." - Alcarus, Selesnya archer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Soulsworn Spirit can't be blocked. When Soulsworn Spirit enters the battlefield, detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Discard two nonland cards with the same name: Draw four cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've dreamt of the future, Isperia. Danger is on the horizon. You must heed my warning."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Stealer of Secrets deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Dimir would hire her, if only they knew where she lived. The Azorius would condemn her, if only they knew her name.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Patience, mage. Killing you now would be too easy."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {W}: Tower Drake gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first motion put forth in the pristine Jelenn Column was for severe restrictions on the airspace around New Prahv.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Voidwielder enters the battlefield, you may return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He makes up his own laws, and that's dangerous to all who love peace and prosperity. Kill him on sight." - Mirela, Azorius hussar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature. Its controller discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Selesnya missionaries moved into the Shanav Quarter, they faced scorn, ridicule, and ultimately martyrdom.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The entire murder scene was covered in dripping, oozing slime. No need for a soothsayer to solve that one." - Pel Javya, Wojek investigator

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target card from a graveyard. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Without a body, the soul is helpless to fight the terms of our contracts." - Somhaur, Orzhov pontiff

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One of the many reasons why open-air markets close at dusk.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Dark Revenant dies, put it on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The murderer faced justice in the Azorius courts, but his soul was set free on a technicality.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He's the unlife of the party.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of each combat, any opponent may sacrifice a creature. If a player does, tap Desecration Demon and put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target land. Its controller reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a land card, then puts those cards into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Everyone knew the Dimir had done the damage. Everyone suspected the Izzet had hired them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has "{R}: This creature gains trample until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You just need the right incentive to fulfill my dreams."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Drainpipe Vermin dies, you may pay {B}. If you do, target player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When times are tough, the poor eat the rats. When times are tougher, the rats eat the poor.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you don't control dies, return it to the battlefield under your control with an additional +1/+1 counter on it at the beginning of the next end step. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.) {1}{B}: Regenerate Grim Roustabout.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He'll point you to your death row seats.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Life's too short to not do the things you love.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With no memories left to compare to his present situation, Andalum was finally content.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, put that many +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Jarad fancies himself king of the undercity, but he's merely king of rot."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender Ogre Jailbreaker can attack as though it didn't have defender as long as you control a Gate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It took three years for it to occur to him to use the chain as a weapon, but once it did, he made up for lost time.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pack Rat's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Rats you control. {2}{B}, Discard a card: Create a token that's a copy of Pack Rat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{B}: Perilous Shadow gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are some shadows that even the Dimir fear.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) Scavenge {2}{B} ({2}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has one or fewer cards in hand, they lose 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A gargoyle's voice reaches pitches that will shatter glass and warp bone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Slum Reaper enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's sent into unguilded districts by the Orzhov to collect the souls of those no one will miss.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -2/-2. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player loses 2 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Pay 3 life: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, you gain 6 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rakdos cultists are her best customers. They never flinch at pain and are seldom good at math.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scavenge {6}{B} ({6}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We follow it through its tunnels, and where it dies, we farm." - Mihas, spore druid

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the bounty on Massacre Girl rose, so did the number of imitators.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let him be an example to others who would default on their debts to us." - "The Cozen," Orzhov assassin

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}, Pay 1 life: Draw a card."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you're looking for it, it's available. The question is how much you're willing to pay.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Scavenge {2}{B}{B} ({2}{B}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Annihilating Fire deals 3 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The most impressive performances can be done only once." - Mote, Rakdos madcap

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike, haste Whenever a player casts a spell from a graveyard, Ash Zealot deals 3 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Smarter than death? Let's see you outsmart my mace, necromancer!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Batterhorn enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Novice shopkeeps spend hours deciding how best to display their wares. Veterans focus on portability.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}: Bellows Lizard gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the price of wood and coal rose, smiths found creative ways to keep their forges burning.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The star performer of the Juri Revue, his shows have fans and blood spilling into the street.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.) Chaos Imps has trample as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The most ancient streets take on a life of their own. A few have decided to move to nicer neighborhoods.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Overload {2}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing evens the odds like a little lightning.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Electrickery deals 1 damage to target creature you don't control. Overload {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Explosive Impact deals 5 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Such boorish noise is what passes for subtlety among the Boros." - Vraska

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create four 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You don't so much hire goblins as put ideas in their heads.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If the pig's blood drips on you, you're next on the chain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, target opponent reveals the top three cards of their library, may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield, then puts the rest into their graveyard. You do the same with the top three cards of your library. If two creatures are put onto the battlefield this way, those creatures fight each other.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Guttersnipe deals 2 damage to each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He wants to watch Ravnica burn, one soul at a time.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender {T}: Lobber Crew deals 1 damage to each opponent. Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, untap Lobber Crew.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's easier to just aim at everything.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The smelting district is home to many who see the guilds as not for them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mizzium Mortars deals 4 damage to target creature you don't control. Overload {3}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "{U}: This creature gains flying until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Watch the voltage. We don't need another charred, crashing viashino." - Bori Andon, Izzet blastseeker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, Pyroconvergence deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Izzet are an equation that turns lunacy into explosions." - Leonos, Azorius arbiter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Close finishes are settled by who can dismount and get to weapons first.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mask isn't meant to hide his identity. It's meant to keep the viscera out of his eyes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Street Spasm deals X damage to target creature without flying you don't control. Overload {X}{X}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target land. Create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblins and architects seldom get along.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing was going to stop it - not the narrow alleys, not the Boros garrison, and certainly not the four-story Orzhov cathedral.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. Until end of turn, it gets +2/+0 and gains haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Joining the Worldsoul took years of study and meditation. Severing that connection took the snap of Rakdos's fingers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, create a 6/6 red Dragon creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fear of dragons is as old and as powerful as the fear of death itself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact you don't control. Overload {4}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beauty is in the eye of the exploder.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Viashino Racketeer enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You may call me a fool, selling this stuff on Orzhov turf. Well, you need to be a little reckless to survive."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature with flying. You gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the towering trees of the Samok Stand and the predators that guard them, the might of the Ravnican wild has returned.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The silk of the archweavers adds structural integrity to otherwise unstable Izzet building sites.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender {T}: Add X mana in any combination of colors, where X is the number of creatures you control with defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only a worthy few are permitted within the sentient forest known as Axebane.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the spires have burned and the cobblestones are dust, he will take his rightful place as king of the wilds." - Kirce, Axebane guardian

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Magistrate Ludy agreed to designate land for the brushstriders only after several broken windows and dozens of missing blini-cakes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{G}, Sacrifice Centaur's Herald: Create a 3/3 green Centaur creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The farther they go from Vitu-Ghazi, the less willing the crowd is to part for them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+1 for each creature you control and gains trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In each of us is the strength of all of us." - Trostani

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scavenge {4}{G}{G} ({4}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some Golgari insects live for centuries - and they never stop growing.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control dies, put X +1/+1 counters on target creature you control, where X is the power of the creature that died.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We traffic in flesh, not souls. Still, it's a shame to let anything go to waste." - Cevraya, Golgari shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scavenge {5}{G} ({5}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Street Swarm is the labor class that drives the Golgari's endless cycle of life and death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn. Populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So many oppose us, but we are the reed that bends without breaking."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender When Gatecreeper Vine enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card or a Gate card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every inch of Ravnica is home to something.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The prohibition of unnecessary tossing of the citizenry by giants shall also extend to spontaneous giants." - Isperia's Edict, provision VII.789.2

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Gobbling Ooze.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The furious citizens blamed the Simic for releasing it in their district. The Simic pointed out that rats were no longer a problem.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures able to block Golgari Decoy do so. Scavenge {3}{G}{G} ({3}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 4/4 green Rhino creature token with trample, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Selesnya are gathering armies. Do you still believe they aren't preparing for war?" - Teysa, to Isperia

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Scavenge {5}{G}{G} ({5}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Bloom enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it. Remove a charge counter from Mana Bloom: Add one mana of any color. Activate only once each turn. At the beginning of your upkeep, if Mana Bloom has no charge counters on it, return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as it's not your turn, tapped creatures you control have hexproof.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The city is vast and perilous, but there are places where a weary traveler can feel very much at home.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The trouble started when a street urchin bet a goblin he could ride one until the clock on Shilbo's Tower struck thirteen.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Untap that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gruul warriors never need to be stirred to battle. They need only to be shown where the battle is.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Raked by vertical spikes of glass and stone, Ravnica's vistas offer only a rare glimpse of the horizon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create an X/X green Ooze creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Give me enough refuse and mana and I will summon an ooze that can engulf all of Ravnica." - Cevraya, Golgari shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{B}: Stonefare Crocodile gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Izzet's plans to exploit the undercity ran into a few stubborn obstacles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It chases its airborne prey relentlessly, heedless to what it pulverizes beneath its hooves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Enchanted land has "Untap this land during each other player's untap step."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ruins of Old Prahv became a wildspace, although all birdsong was silenced by lingering Azorius magic.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Wild Beastmaster attacks, each other creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is Wild Beastmaster's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When they covered the world in city, all they did was give themselves nowhere to run."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Worldspine Wurm dies, create three 5/5 green Wurm creature tokens with trample. When Worldspine Wurm is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Destroy target nonland permanent with mana value 3 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Izzet quickly suspended their policy of lifetime guarantees.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Archon of the Triumvirate attacks, detain up to two target nonland permanents your opponents control. (Until your next turn, those permanents can't attack or block and their activated abilities can't be activated.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Armada Wurm enters the battlefield, create a 5/5 green Wurm creature token with trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No one in the Conclave acts alone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +4/-4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Finally, a weapon the Boros can't confiscate!" - Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn. • Draw a card. • Put target attacking or blocking creature on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The rules of logic and order have already made the choice for you." - Isperia

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 3/3 green Centaur creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Centaurs are sent to evangelize in Gruul territories where words of war speak louder than prayers of peace.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike, haste Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its favorite treats are candied hands and sweet hearts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Centaur Healer enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Instructors at the Kasarna training grounds are capable healers in case their students fail to grasp the subtleties of combat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you don't control gets -2/-0 until end of turn and attacks this turn if able. Overload {3}{U}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Senators of Azorius often hired agents to spy on the Selesnya. They were told to record every spore and root they saw, as each could become a deadly foe.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wolf riders hone their skills traversing the perilous rooftops, each dizzying step bringing elf and wolf closer together.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, twice that many +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Weakness is not in the nature of the Swarm.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Counter target spell you don't control. Overload {1}{U}{U}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 3/3 green Centaur creature token, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bleak rumors reached Trostani's ears. She decreed that no one should travel alone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Detention Sphere enters the battlefield, you may exile target nonland permanent not named Detention Sphere and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent. When Detention Sphere leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to the battlefield under their owner's control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature to its owner's hand. You gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I never thought I'd be so glad to see two tons of beak and claws bearing down on me at the speed of an arrow." - Mirela, Azorius hussar

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Rakdos-controlled neighborhoods, everyone is part of the show.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Scavenge {3}{B}{G} ({3}{B}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile the top X cards of your library. You may cast instant and sorcery spells with mana value X or less from among them without paying their mana costs. Then put all cards exiled this way that weren't cast into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target creature spell. Essence Backlash deals damage equal to that spell's power to its controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The other guilds will learn the hard way not to interfere with our investigations." - Bori Andon, Izzet blastseeker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. You gain 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My ruling is final. Order is upheld. Justice is done."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for an instant card with mana value 3, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then repeat this process for instant cards with mana values 2 and 1. Then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When asked how much power is required, Izzet mages always answer "more."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn. • Destroy target enchantment. • Regenerate each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the rest of Ravnica sneer. One way or another, they all end up in the undercity." - Jarad

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature or land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the Golgari, anything buried is treasure.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Players can't gain life. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player loses half their life, rounded up.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We can't control enemies who have no regard for their own survival." - Arrester Lavinia, Tenth Precinct

property.name: Rules
property.value: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.) {2}{B}{R}, Sacrifice Hellhole Flailer: Hellhole Flailer deals damage equal to its power to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They share no bloodline, but a bond greater than family unites them. Such are the gifts of the Worldsoul.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You think no one is watching, you think you're smart enough to escape, and most foolish of all, you think no one cares." - Arrester Lavinia, Tenth Precinct

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, haste You may cast sorcery spells as though they had flash. (You may cast them any time you could cast an instant.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even this primitive specimen of my kind is impressive." - Niv-Mizzet

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I serve only justice. But through that duty, I serve all of Ravnica."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}. • Izzet Charm deals 2 damage to target creature. • Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Haste {T}: Izzet Staticaster deals 1 damage to target creature and each other creature with the same name as that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Jarad, Golgari Lich Lord gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your graveyard. {1}{B}{G}, Sacrifice another creature: Each opponent loses life equal to the sacrificed creature's power. Sacrifice a Swamp and a Forest: Return Jarad from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to two creature cards and reveal them. Put one into your hand and the other into your graveyard. Then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Izzet are searching for something. Discern what or die trying."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{B}{G}: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains intimidate until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) {2}{B}{G}, Sacrifice a nontoken creature: Create X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens, where X is the sacrificed creature's toughness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Discard a creature card: Put a +1/+1 counter on Lotleth Troll. {B}: Regenerate Lotleth Troll.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He lurks in the undercity, eager for the corpse haulers to unload their rotting cargo.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Loxodon Smiter, put it onto the battlefield instead of putting it into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Lyev Skyknight enters the battlefield, detain target nonland permanent an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that permanent can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}, {T}: Draw two cards. {R}, {T}, Discard a card: Mercurial Chemister deals damage to target creature equal to the discarded card's mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What some see as "distracted" is really "fathoming the unfathomable."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}{U}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. {3}{W}{U}: Detain target nonland permanent an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that permanent can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{U}{R}: Draw a card, then discard a card. {2}{U}{R}: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The only action worth taking is one with an unknown outcome."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Niv-Mizzet, Dracogenius deals damage to a player, you may draw a card. {U}{R}: Niv-Mizzet, Dracogenius deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He has no patience for minds that do not inspire him or explode by trying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Exile target player's graveyard. • Destroy target artifact. • Each creature deals 1 damage to its controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let all feel joy in pain." - Rakdos

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ragemutts pull the chariots of the Butcher Clowns, a trio of wingless, zombified faeries formerly of the Izzet.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Whenever Rakdos Ringleader deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card at random. {B}: Regenerate Rakdos Ringleader.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You can't cast this spell unless an opponent lost life this turn. Flying, trample Creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each 1 life your opponents have lost this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rakdos's Return deals X damage to target opponent or planeswalker. That player or that planeswalker's controller discards X cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Lord Rakdos stirred from his slumber, everyone else's nightmare began.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each card in its controller's hand. At the beginning of the draw step of enchanted creature's controller, that player draws an additional card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When one of the great guardians arises, it sweeps enemies aside like chaff yet takes care not to crush a single insect underfoot.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Don't cross a Devkarin elf unless you long for an early grave.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}{R}: Target blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. {B}{R}: Target player who lost life this turn loses 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player reveals their hand. You gain life equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "And would you care to explain why your satchel is radiating an aura of unstable energy?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. • Exile target creature with power 5 or greater. • Create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Skull Rend deals 2 damage to each opponent. Those players each discard two cards at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We could never accept anyone with a face that pretty or a mind that sane." - Nyoser, Gore-House ringleader

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Skymark Roc attacks, you may return target creature defending player controls with toughness 2 or less to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Try not to look guilty. Or delicious." - Thorpe, street urchin

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Choose a nonland card name. Search target opponent's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with that name and exile them. Then that player shuffles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) Scavenge {1}{B}{G} ({1}{B}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Straight from the blood-drenched imagination of our illustrious parun!" - Nyoser, Gore-House ringleader

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain X life and draw X cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the knowledge of absolute law inspire you to live a life of absolute order."

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Destroy all creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Leonos had no second thoughts about the abolishment edict. He'd left skyrunes warning of the eviction, even though it was cloudy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn. Overload {3}{U}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw four cards, then discard two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If this is thinking, I don't know what I was doing before."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Treasured Find.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gorgons crave beautiful things: gems, exquisite amulets, the alabaster corpses of the petrified dead . . .

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) {1}{B}{G}: Regenerate Trestle Troll.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unwelcome in Golgari colonies, he found his own dark place from which to represent the Swarm.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness. {1}{G}{W}, {T}: Populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}{G}{W}: Create a 3/3 green Centaur creature token. {2}{G}{W}: Populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Preachers of freedom forget that conformity can be beautiful."

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Until your next turn, whenever a creature deals combat damage to Vraska the Unseen, destroy that creature. −3: Destroy target nonland permanent. −7: Create three 1/1 black Assassin creature tokens with "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Wayfaring Temple's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control. Whenever Wayfaring Temple deals combat damage to a player, populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a filibuster counter on Azor's Elocutors. Then if Azor's Elocutors has five or more filibuster counters on it, you win the game. Whenever a source deals damage to you, remove a filibuster counter from Azor's Elocutors.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Blistercoil Weird gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Untap it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Azorius lawmages would like to outlaw the creation of weirds, but first they'd have to settle their long-standing debate on how to classify them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Cryptborn Horror enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the total life lost by your opponents this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Although Cryptwitch Merree vanished after a spat with Rakdos, her playthings lingered.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Exile target land card from a graveyard. Add one mana of any color. {B}, {T}: Exile target instant or sorcery card from a graveyard. Each opponent loses 2 life. {G}, {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. You gain 2 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an instant or sorcery card would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We will defend the Worldsoul from Izzet ‘progress' at any cost."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {UR}: Frostburn Weird gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many chemisters are oblivious to the innumerable machinations of their guild, instead focusing obsessively on creating the perfect weird.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Despite its enormous stature, it can fold itself into a tunnel with startling quickness, vanishing back into the undercity.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We will grow an army large enough to withstand the Izzet's madness." - Trostani

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Sacrifice Judge's Familiar: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It misses nothing and it has no sense of humor." - Barvisa, courtroom scribe

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile an instant or sorcery spell you control: Put two +1/+1 counters on Nivmagus Elemental. (That spell won't resolve.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When it escaped, the experimenters hesitated. It would cause untold havoc, yet they wished to see it in action.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Devil-blades and dripping blood make music Rakdos never tires of hearing.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If there were such a thing as a soul, I think it would be behind the gallbladder but above the kidneys."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scavenge {0} ({0}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It makes better use of Uncle Dragi's head than he ever did." - Pesha, retired blacksmith

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One day every pillar will be a tree and every hall a glade." - Trostani

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the Azorius, the opportunity to serve the law is too great an honor for death to interrupt.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {W} or {U}. {W}{U}: Azorius Keyrune becomes a 2/2 white and blue Bird artifact creature with flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The higher the mind soars, the greater its understanding of the law." - Isperia

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color." {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dimir mages put the lanterns to good use, creating shapeshifters and sleeper agents from mana foreign to them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 for each of its colors. Equip {1}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those without a guild signet often display a different form of protection.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target player mills a card. (They put the top card of their library into their graveyard.) {5}, {T}, Sacrifice Codex Shredder: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {B} or {G}. {B}{G}: Golgari Keyrune becomes a 2/2 black and green Insect artifact creature with deathtouch until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like a single ant, it only hints at the colony below.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {U} or {R}. {U}{R}: Until end of turn, Izzet Keyrune becomes a 2/1 blue and red Elemental artifact creature. Whenever Izzet Keyrune deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Pithing Needle enters the battlefield, choose a card name. Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fearful want the procedure before a blood festival. The guilty seek it afterward.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {B} or {R}. {B}{R}: Rakdos Keyrune becomes a 3/1 black and red Devil artifact creature with first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Rakdos use it for everything you can think of and plenty more than that.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {G} or {W}. {G}{W}: Selesnya Keyrune becomes a 3/3 green and white Wolf artifact creature until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A mark of unity when you want one; a fierce guardian when you need one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Street Sweeper attacks, destroy all Auras attached to target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sweepers roam endlessly, scrubbing away the refuse - and anything else too slow or too clumsy to get out of their way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Tablet of the Guilds enters the battlefield, choose two colors. Whenever you cast a spell, if it's at least one of the chosen colors, you gain 1 life for each of the chosen colors it is.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is rumored the Azorius paid an exorbitant sum to ensure its symbol would appear at the top.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Volatile Rig attacks each combat if able. Whenever Volatile Rig is dealt damage, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, sacrifice Volatile Rig. When Volatile Rig dies, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, it deals 4 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Azorius Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Enter the Senate, the seat of justice and the foundation of Ravnican society.

property.name: Rules
